data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 163,218 cultural Christians in the state of Western Finland to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Western Finland, Finland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 23,752 believers in Western Finland that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary: On average, 19 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Western Finland, Finland.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Western Finland, Finland to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Western Finland with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Tajik people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Western Finland, Finland.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Western Finland, Finland need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Western Finland.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Western Finland
location.people_groups_list: Nepalese, Thai, Arab, Iraqi, Dutch, Arab, Egyptian
